attributes.action: stop them closing glan clwyd meternaity ward down
attributes.additional_details:
there is alot of people complainting about the meternaity ward at glan clwyd hospital to be shut down we are all happy with the way the ward is already being run we dont want it to be closed there are lots of stories about how good the meternaity is at glan clwyd and there stories about there babies

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Save-Doctor-led-maternity-services-North-Wales/1552191701706213

that the page on fb that every one writing there stories on. we want the maternaity ward to stay open what if somthing goes wrong we have to travel all way to bangor or wrexham surely there guna be more death rates the babies are not guna last long in the womb is the baby destressed or the mother ends up having a high or low blood pressure we want to save the meternaity ward stay open we are happy with the way things are going keep it open we like it the way it is !!

rejection.details: The NHS in Wales is a matter for the Welsh Assembly
